section.title: MathML Testsuite
section.para: This module contains the MathML testsuite from W3C, rendered to SVG
Please note: Although the testsuite may say "your browsers rendering" it acutally referrs to JEuclids rendering
You need a browser with SVG support, for example a recent version of Firefox, Safari, or Opera
Go on to JEuclids rendering of the W3C MathML 2 testsuite or to JEuclids rendering of the W3C MathML 3 testsuite.
